amendment.description: An amendment numbered 18 printed in the Congressional Record to increase Bilateral Economic Assistance funds for development assistance by $15 million; decrease USAID in title II by $2.1 million; decrease Multilateral Investment Guarantee Agency funding in title IV by $4.9 million; and decrease the Inter-American Investment Corporation funding by $8 million in title IV.

action.text: By unanimous consent, the Roemer amendment was withdrawn.
